objects.name: Reboot - using long tap/power

steps.instruction: TBD

objects.name: Silent mode - using long press/power

steps.instruction: TBD

objects.description:
Disabled, this case is a duplicate of  TC#3534

"As a user, I want the phone menu to display the high-level phone actions (including Turn off Airplane Mode, Silence Incoming Calls, Power off) when I long-press the power button,
so I can easily control the phone's important states."

Prerequisites:  Phone is in state where Airplane Mode is off.
objects.name: Airplane mode - using long press/power

steps.expected: Phone menu is displayed with the following options:  "Turn On Airplane mode", "Silence Incoming calls", "Restart", "Power off".  There is also a "Cancel" button at the bottom.
steps.instruction: Long press the power button.

objects.description:
Prerequisites:
- Create a contact person with a valid phone number in the Contacts App
objects.name: [SMS] Sending SMS

steps.instruction: 1) on Homescreen launch Contacts App (Orange circle with a white person silhouette)
2) select a pre-existing contact person
3) Check if a phone number exists

steps.expected: In the Messaging App, the cursor is blinking in the textbox with a keyboard popped up
steps.instruction: 4) Tap the SMS out icon on the far right

steps.expected:
After hitting send, your message you typed will appear in the Message log
 Pull down the notification tray, and verify the same message appears in the notifications log
steps.instruction: Type in a message and hit "Send".

objects.name: [Settings] Verify default list

steps.expected:
#Network & Connectivity
- Airplane mode = unchecked
- GPS = checked
- Wifi = offline
.- Cellular & Data = <empty> 
- Cellular & Data = <name of service provider> (if SIM card installed)
- Bluetooth = Disabled
- Hotspot 

# Personalization
- Sound
- Brightness
- Wallpaper
- Language & Region
- Keyboard

# Security & Privacy
- Phone Lock

# Device
- About Phone
- Accessibility
- Storage
steps.instruction:
1. Launch the Setting App for the first time

2. Confirm the list of default settings and values

objects.description:
As a user I want to be visually notified when Airplane mode is enabled or disabled so I can understand the state of my phones connections.

Please see this issue: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1034455
objects.name: [Settings] Enabling / Disabling Airplane Mode

steps.instruction: Launch Settings App.

steps.expected: An airplane icon appears in the upper right hand corner of the status bar. If Wireless or Data connection icons were previously shown in the Status Bar, they should not appear if Airplane mode is enabled.
steps.instruction: Enable Airplane Mode.

steps.expected: The airplane icon should not be present in notification tray with Airplane mode off. Wifi and/or Data connection icons should appear in the notification tray again if they were previously enabled.
steps.instruction: Disable Airplane Mode.

steps.expected: Airplane mode is still functioning properly without issue.
steps.instruction: Repeat steps 2 and 3 at least 20 times

objects.description:
This case checks that the functionality of homescreen works when the phone is booted, and that you can unlock the device through the Lockscreen

#Pre-Requisite:
#-Have a Sim PIN set
#-Have Phonelock toggled ON
objects.name: [HOME SCREEN] Verify that the User can unlock the device and navigate the Homescreen

steps.expected: The device is booted to the Lockscreen
steps.instruction: Power on the device

steps.expected: The device is unlocked and the Sim PIN disable prompt is given.
steps.instruction: On the Lockscreen, Slide to the right to unlock th phone.

steps.expected: Homescreen is launched and SIM is detected.
steps.instruction: Enter in SIM PIN to unlock SIM.

steps.expected: It is possible to navigate between pages, and all homescreen app icons are displayed correctly
steps.instruction: Pan down on the homescreen.

steps.expected: It is possible to navigate between pages, and all homescreen app icons are displayed correctly
steps.instruction: Pan up on the homescreen.

objects.description: It should be possible to launch all P0 apps from Homescreen without crashing or hanging.
objects.name: [HOME SCREEN] Launch Apps from Homescreen

steps.expected: Dialer launches.
steps.instruction: Launch the homescreen.  Open the dialer app.

steps.expected: SMS app launches.
steps.instruction: Click home button.  Open the SMS app.

steps.expected: Browser app launches.
steps.instruction: Click home button.  Open the Browser app.

steps.expected: Contacts app launches.
steps.instruction: Click home button.  Open the Contacts app.

steps.expected: Settings app launches.
steps.instruction: Click home button.  Open the Settings app.

steps.expected: Camera app launches.
steps.instruction: Click the home button.  Open the Camera app.

steps.expected: Gallery app launches.
steps.instruction: Click the home button.  Open the Gallery app.

steps.expected: Marketplace app launches.
steps.instruction: Click the home button.  Open the Marketplace app.

objects.description: It should be possible to launch the dialer, make an outgoing call, and adjust the call volume while the call is active.
objects.name: [DIALER] Verify an outbound call can be made and that the Call Volume can be adjusted

steps.expected: Dialer launches
steps.instruction: From the Homescreen, Launch the Dialer App

steps.expected: The Number is displayed as entered in the number field of the dialer
steps.instruction: Dial a phone number including a Country and Area Code

steps.expected: Phone call is initiated and the call rings out to the number dialled
steps.instruction: Tap the "Dial" button

steps.expected: Verify that the Call Volume gets louder
steps.instruction: While the phone call is in progress, adjust the volume rocker up

steps.expected: Verify that the Call Volume gets quieter
steps.instruction: While the phone call is in progress, adjust the volume rocker down

objects.description: It should be possible to multitask on the phone; e.g. open a few different apps while a call is in progress.
objects.name: [DIALER] Open different apps during a call

steps.expected: The homescreen is invoked.
steps.instruction: Open the dialer and initiate a call (alternately, you can accept an incoming call).   Click the home button.

steps.expected: Camera app launches.  Phone call continues.
steps.instruction: With the call in session, click the home button and launch the Camera app.

steps.expected: Gallery app launches. Phone call continues.
steps.instruction: With the call in session, click the home button and launch the Gallery app.

steps.expected: Calendar app launches.  Phone call  continues.
steps.instruction: With the call in session, click the home button and launch the Calendar app.

objects.description:
Verify that when the device is Locked, it is able to receive a call, and that the vibration and sound from receiving a call functions correctly

#Pre-Requisite:
#-Have Ring Volume set above 50%
#-Have Vibrate and Ring Enabled
#-Have PhoneLock toggled ON
objects.name: [DIALER] Verify that the User can receive a call whilst the device is locked

steps.expected: The phone is locked and the screen is shut off
steps.instruction: From the Homescreen, Lock the device by pressing the power button
From a second device call the Locked device

steps.expected: Phone call should ring in to the locked device with vibration and sound
steps.instruction: The Locked device receives the call

objects.description:
It should be possible to receive a call, and if the phone is configured so, get vibration and ring tone, if the device is  unlocked.

Prerequisites:  The device is unlocked.
objects.name: [DIALER] Receive a call with vibration and sound (device unlocked)

steps.instruction: Go to Settings and Select Sound settings make sure volume is set at least half way.
Turn on "Vibrate" and "Ring" by enabling them.

steps.expected: It should be possible to receive a call with vibration and sound to the unlocked device.
steps.instruction: Call into the unlocked device

objects.description: It should be possible to activate/deactivate mute during a call.
objects.name: [DIALER]  Activate/Deactivate mute during a call

steps.instruction: Call the device from a separate line or device.

steps.expected: Audio from  call should not be audible on the second phone.
steps.instruction: Toggle the mute button (on call screen or call screen -> on keypad) on and speak.

steps.expected: Audio from the call should be audible on the second phone.
steps.instruction: Toggle the mute off (on call screen or call screen -> on keypad) and speak.

objects.description: If two or more calls are made to the same number, they should be bunched accordingly in the call log.
objects.name: [CALL LOG] Make two or more calls to the same number

steps.expected: In the call log, calls to the same number are bunched together with" (2)" following the number string.
steps.instruction: Using the B2G phone, make and terminate two subequent calls to the same number.

steps.expected: In the call log, calls to the same number are similarly bunched.  The correct number of calls to same number is shown in the parentheses following the number string.
steps.instruction: Make several more calls to the same number.

objects.description: When two or more calls are received from the same number, they should be bunched accordingly in the call log.
objects.name: [CALL LOG] Receive 2 or more calls from the same number

steps.expected: In the call log, calls from the same number are bunched together with" (2)" following the number string.
steps.instruction: Using another phone, make and terminate two subequent calls (into the B2G phone) from the same number.

steps.expected: In the call log, calls from the same number are similarly bunched.  The correct number of calls to same number is shown in the parentheses following the number string.
steps.instruction: Make several more calls from the same number.

objects.description: When two or more missed calls are received from the same number, they should be bunched accordingly in the call log.
objects.name: [CALL LOG] Receive 2 or more missed calls from the same number

steps.expected: In both the call log and missed call log, calls from the same number are bunched together with" (2)" following the number string.
steps.instruction: Using another phone, make and terminate two subequent calls (into the B2G phone) from the same number.  Terminate the calls before answering them on B2G phone.

objects.description:
Call log should show the correct contents of the tabs All and Missed.

Prerequisites:  
Have some missed/ ignored/ answered calls from both contacts and non-contacts(just phone numbers)
objects.name: [CALL LOG] Verify the contents of the tabs All and Missed display correctly.

steps.expected: DUT should receive a missed call notification.
steps.instruction: With another device create some missed calls to the DUT.

steps.expected: Dialer app is launched and Call log is displayed.
steps.instruction: Tap on Missed Call Notification.

steps.expected: "All"  should show all incoming calls, sorted by state.  Missed calls are also shown in a separate tab.
steps.instruction: Click "All"

steps.expected: "Missed" shows all missed calls.
steps.instruction: Click "Missed"

objects.description:
It should be possible to select and delete call logs.

Prerequisites:
Have a missed and answered call from a contact and a number.
objects.name: [CALL LOG] Select and delete a call log.

steps.instruction: Open the Dialer app.
Tap on Call Log icon.
Click the "Edit" icon (top right corner).

steps.expected: Calls associated with that number are deleted.  If it was a missed call, those related calls are deleted from "missed calls".
steps.instruction: Delete a missed Contact entry.

steps.expected: Calls associated with that number are deleted.  If it was a missed call, those related calls are deleted from "missed calls".
steps.instruction: Delete an answered Contact entry.

steps.expected: Calls associated with that number are deleted.  If it was a missed call, those related calls are deleted from "missed calls".
steps.instruction: Delect a missed number entry

steps.expected: Calls associated with that number are deleted.  If it was a missed call, those related calls are deleted from "missed calls".
steps.instruction: Delete an Answered entry.

objects.description: It should be possible to delete all call logs.
objects.name: [CALL LOG] Delete all call logs

objects.description:
It must be possible to create a contact by filling all contact fields. The data should be preserved.

Prerequisite:
Have some photos on the device.
objects.name: [CONTACTS] Verify the user can add a new contact. (filling all the fields)

steps.expected: The contacts app will open.
steps.instruction: Open the Contacts app.

steps.expected:
New "add contact" screen is displayed.

All fields are available and editable (e.g. appropriate keyboard pops up for the field, be it numeric or alphabetical).
steps.instruction: Tap "+" icon (top right).

steps.expected: A thumbnail of the Gallery image you selected and cropped appears in the box.
steps.instruction: Add a Picture from Gallery (select Gallery, and pick an image)
Add a first name.
Add a last name.
Add a Phone number.
Add an E-mail.
Add a Street address.
Add a Zip code.
Add a City.
Add a Country.
Add a Comment

steps.expected: After clicking done, all of the available field data is available when reaccessing the contact (include after phone restart or shutting the contacts app).
steps.instruction: Press the Done button in the top right.
Press the edit button in the top right.

steps.expected: A thumbnail of the image you took from Camera appears in the box
steps.instruction: Add a Picture from Camera app (select Camera, and take a picture)
